thread.title: Emma Watson Wore a Dior Couture Dress Covered in Doodles
thread.title_full: Emma Watson Wore a Dior Couture Dress Covered in Doodles

title: Emma Watson Wore a Dior Couture Dress Covered in Doodles
text: Emma Watson Wore a Dior Couture Dress Covered in Doodles Most Popular By Alyssa Bailey Feb 13, 2017 Tonight, Emma Watson wore the first of what's sure to be many princess dresses during her Beauty and the Beast press tour at ELLE UK's Style Awards. The outfit, from Christian Dior's haute couture spring 2017 collection , is doodle-covered and basically an art piece itself: Getty Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Watson styled the dress simply with an updo and minimal accessories. There was no crown this time. On the Dior runway last month Getty
